name: Rubris
description:
Rotate the cube to position the falling blocks, fill rows to clear them and gain points. When the timer hits zero it's game over, so keep destroying blocks to keep your time up.

Don't forget to use the hard-drop to clear blocks as quickly as possible!

Log in with a Newgrounds account to compete on the global  highscore leaderboard.

Controls:

  • Arrow Keys or WASD: Rotate the cube.
  • Space or Z: Hard-drop the current piece.
  • ESC: Pause.

Credits:

  • Game by sarn
  • Music by Mista Jub

The game's music can be found here.
